subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If Jo-Jo Reyes does not beat the Yankees on Wednesday, he will join Matt Keough of the 1978-79 Oakland Athletics as the only pitchers since 1923 to make 28 consecutive starts without a victory.
snippet: If Jo-Jo Reyes does not beat the Yankees on Wednesday, he will join Matt Keough of the 1978-79 Oakland Athletics as the only pitchers since 1923 to make 28 consecutive starts without a victory.
